abstract.t: This draft describes the use of COPS-PR for support of a PDP provisioning a PEP with RSVP policy control criteria and defines a RSVP policy control criteria PIB for this purpose. The RSVPCC-PIB described in the document is provided for definition of policies that are currently defined by the outsourcing model [2749]. It is designed to be scalable and flexible as well as extensible for accommodating future policy criteria.
